dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3050399Q] Violation of your TOS
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] Sent: Monday, February 12, 2007 9:28 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3050399Q] Violation of your TOS ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Violation of your TOS Added by system at Monday, Feb 12 2007 01:49 pm X-MailFrom: cindy_mp4u@yahoo.co.uk X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Mon Feb 12 13:48:26 2007 Received: (qmail 8332 invoked by alias); 12 Feb 2007 19:48:26 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 8329 invoked from network); 12 Feb 2007 19:48:26 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 12 Feb 2007 19:48:26 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 12 Feb 2007 13:48:25 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Mon, 12 Feb 2007 13:48:25 -0600 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from cindy_mp4u@yahoo.co.uk) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HGhA1-0000tx-L7 for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 12 Feb 2007 13:48:25 -0600 Received: from web25410.mail.ukl.yahoo.com ([217.146.176.228]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from cindy_mp4u@yahoo.co.uk) with smtp (Exim) id 1HGh9r-0004U4-JW for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 12 Feb 2007 13:48:15 -0600 Received: (qmail 64676 invoked by uid 60001); 12 Feb 2007 19:48:13 -0000 DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; q=dns; c=nofws; s=s1024; d=yahoo.co.uk; h=X-YMail-OSG:Received:X-Mailer:Date:From:Reply-To:Subject:To:MIME-Versi on:Content-Type:Message-ID; b=fgFVwp+SN3oA4bs5QoOd8usC5YRvUQyOOoohDnrkM63e3Pk5SxflCzWEb1dADnRA1Ju/DQ EYDTEEmaAPBDTqqb/tl/XdovuTNTrxbYEiFbtxb0M379qqYErRsYEG7NVpNKyl77mFl2Abh6 zcAe4MSRFZ8rPIobaQBJw4M+byNcg=; X-YMail-OSG: r20u3WoVM1nO5X6z3ofWbfX5u.2tORLS.h.JbL2.quyzZLkd_N_0_eh3r8CO6M6smXvHHgIx lyT5iEvq7sl2o.3apjEg9mrOXkgCRJDqMGoSn36fCEufXeFca3z0d7bMpSeEdWJ6EvBp Received: from [89.55.34.71] by web25410.mail.ukl.yahoo.com via HTTP; Mon, 12 Feb 2007 19:48:13 GMT X-Mailer: YahooMailRC/368.7 YahooMailWebService/0.6.132.7 Date: Mon, 12 Feb 2007 19:48:13 +0000 (GMT) From: Cindy PantyParadise Reply-To: Cindy PantyParadise Subject: Violation of your TOS To: abuse@theplanet.com, sales@hostgator.com MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="0-352428099-1171309693=:63655" Message-ID: <352807.63655.qm@web25410.mail.ukl.yahoo.com> X-OriginalArrivalTime: 12 Feb 2007 19:48:25.0869 (UTC) FILETIME=[C2A5A3D0:01C74EDE] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) This site is a scam: superhottchicks.com I believe it to be registered or connected with your company somehow. I am a panty seller registered with Panty Trust. This site claims to take peoples money and contact us for used panties. This is a lie and this website and our photos have NOT been authorised for use in any way for this website. I trust you will do the appropriate thing and get rid of this site - its is obviously a scam that is only interested in ripping off people by making them supply their credit card information to "see" us. Its a complete fraud and I am so angry that myself and Panty Trust shall be taking this matter further if this site continues to run. Many thanks, Cindy Becker Panty Trust Member MIME element (text/html)
This site is a scam: superhottchicks.com
 
I believe it to be registered or connected with your company somehow.
 
I am a panty seller registered with Panty Trust. This site claims to take peoples money and contact us for used panties. This is a lie and this website and our photos have NOT been authorised for use in any way for this website.
 
I trust you will do the appropriate thing and get rid of this site - its is obviously a scam that is only interested in ripping off people by making them supply their credit card information to "see" us. Its a complete fraud and I am so angry that myself and Panty Trust shall be taking this matter further if this site continues to run.
 
Many thanks,
Cindy Becker Panty Trust Member
MIME element (text/plain)
